group_1.textLeft: Whoa! There's so much spaaace!

group_1.textRight: Well? It's a pretty nice place, don't you@think?

group_1.textLeft: You've always been good at finding things,@but this is impressive, even for you.

group_1.textRight: Well, that's my job after all.

group_1.textLeft: Heeey, Hazuki! Where should I put this?

group_1.textRight: Huh? Oh, you mean your treasure box?
Let's see... How about putting it in that @closet over there?

group_1.textLeft: Okie dokey!

group_1.textRight: Did you find something new to put in it?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, um, yeah, I did.

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: It's...THIS! Check it out!

group_1.textRight: Huh?!@[chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] It's a...
Hmm... That's a bell from a bicycle,@isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Sure is! It's the only thing I found!

group_1.textRight: Where did you get it?

group_1.textLeft: The river bed. I picked it up when we@were lookin' for that Witch.
Look, it still rings!@RING RING RING!!!

group_1.textRight: We don't need to hear it! Geeze...

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it cool, though? It's JUST the bell!@No bike!
Wonder where it floated down from?@Maybe it just fell off by itself?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* You're having fun, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: Still, don't you think Ayame's little@habit has gotten...more intense?

group_1.textRight: At least she isn't picking up dead insects@anymore. That's some kind of improvement?

group_1.textLeft: Weeell, yeah...

group_1.textRight: If she goes around scavenging for things@like bicycle bells, well, it's...rather...
Um...an artistic means of self expression,@maybe?

group_1.textLeft: There you go again. You spoil her when you@put such a positive spin on it...
Wh-what is it? Are you okay?

group_1.textRight: She has very good instincts, right?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I guess so. They've saved us quite a@few times...

group_1.textRight: Perhaps the two are linked!
Her habit of picking up items could be due@to her artistic sensibilities?

group_1.textLeft: Ayame... Just don't get carried away,@okay?

group_1.textRight: Hazuki, where are you going? It makes@sense, doesn't it? Her artistic instincts!

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna head to the store to pick up@some stuff.

group_1.textRight: Then please buy some art supplies. Ayame,@would you like to do some drawing?

group_1.textLeft: Drawing? Me?

group_1.textRight: Yes. How about it? Just to try it out.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, okay! Fine by me!

group_1.narration: Konoha and Hazuki and me... We've been@together since I was REALLY little!
We've had fun times, happy times...@Tough times, and even sad times...
We've stuck together through all of it!@We really get each other!
And, plus!@We all met in one place!
